 Special Instruction

 TCS 0.10% APPLICABLE
 DELVIERY & BILLING ASPER PO ADDRESS
 30S 60% BCI COTTON 40% POLY MELANANGE YARN
 SHADE BURDGANDY HTR - Â§ NO 11549
 QTY - 36 KGS
 SHORTAGE FROM PO QTY NOT ACCEPTABLE [= AS Per NSC
 DELVIERY 20DAYS TO 25DAYS FROM PO â€”=> H~ JUN Â£ Bx muh ASP
 BOOKED AGAISNT #3079
 1)if we found any deviation (Mixing of Yarn or Traces or Blend Variation) or goods are not as per the Purchae order item
 specification , supplier will be liable to take debit for full garment Value.
 2) Goods Shall not be accepted by the company unless a copy of the purchase order accompanies the delivery
 delivery challan.
 3) You must mention the Our Ref. No. in each of the delivery challan. Our Ref.No. is given on the purchase order
 sheet.
 4) Payment shall made on the actual weight or quantity received and accepted by our office/factory (s) as evidence ~~ by
 the office/factory (s) records.
 5) All payments will be made by A/c payee cheque only.
 6) Itis a condition of this contract ( in addition to all conditions and warranties implied by law ) that the said goods
 shall fully confirm to the descriptions, quantity and quality requirements therein provided and shall be of good
 material and workmanship exactly suitable for the purpose for which they are intended and completely free from all
 types of defects in any form.
 7) In case of failure in the above respect (Point No 5..) by the sellers, the company reserves the right to reject all or
 any part of the supplied materials and the seller shall be liable to the company for all it's losses, expenses and
 damages arising therefrom.
 8) The removal of the rejected material shall be solely the seller's responsibility and within 7 days from the date of
 Company's intimation of this effect they shall remove the material at their cost and in case of falilure they shall be liable
 to the company for storing and other charges.
 9) The Company reserves the right to cancel the contract fully or in part thereof. The Company shall be entitled to
 rescind the contract fully or in part if the delivery of the goods are not made in accordance with the requirements
 detailed above without taking any formal steps such as sending formal demand notice or otherwise. the right shall b
 excercisable by the company within a period of 6 months from the supply of receipt of goods.
 10) The time limit for the supply shall commence from this order.
 11) the company shall not be liable to accept the goods owing to conditions beyond it's control or specified in the
 order.
 12) The company assumes no obligation in relation to the delivery of the goods in excess of those specified in the
 order.
 13) Bills should be raised on Texport Syndicate at Office address.
 14) Goods to be delivered at Texport Syndicate Bangalore / Tirupur / Mumbai address.
 15) All Inland Insurance Cover by Us
 Remarks
 PAYMENT AGAINST DELIVERY ,
 We Accept the order subject to above terms and condition.
 Thanking you we remain
 Supplier Acceptance Yours Faithfully, â€™
 For NSC SPINNING MILLS PVT LTD for Texport Syndicate Private Limited
 (Signature) Prepared By ~~ Taduka Harish MN Arie ignature
